name: Protocol Guild: Funding & Incentivising Core Protocol Work
description: The Protocol Guild aims to secure the future of Ethereum, by enabling a highly efficient way for its ecosystem and community to sustainably fund core protocol development, while rebalancing incentives for core protocol contributors.

speakers.name: cheeky-gorilla
speakers.bio: As a contributor to the Protocol Guild, I spend my time building norms around setting aside a portion of Ethereum's ecosystem revenues to fund core protocol work.
